search_information.query_displayed: Reproducing (and Disrupting) Heteronormativity: Gendered Sexual Socialization in Preschool Classrooms Gansen, Heidi M. Sociology of Education

organic_results.title: Reproducing (and disrupting) heteronormativity: Gendered sexual socialization in preschool classrooms
organic_results.snippet: Using ethnographic data from 10 months of observations in nine preschool classrooms, I examine gendered sexual socialization children receive from teachers' practices and reproduce through peer interactions. I find heteronormativity permeates preschool classrooms, where teachers construct (and occasionally disrupt) gendered sexuality in a number of different ways, and children reproduce (and sometimes resist) these identities and norms in their daily play. Teachers use what I call facilitative, restrictive, disruptive, and …

publication_info.summary: HM Gansen - Sociology of Education, 2017 - journals.sagepub.com
